mapper.select:
select a.MENU_ID as menuId, a.MENU_NAME as menuName, a.PARENT_MENU_ID as parentMenuId, a.MENU_ICON as menuIcon, a.MENU_URL as menuUrl, a.MENU_PERMISSIONS as menuPermissions, a.COMPONENT as component, a.REDIRECT as redirect, a.HIDDEN as hidden, a.IS_ROUTE as isRoute, a.ROUTE_NAME as routeName, a.IS_CACHE as isCache, a.affix as affix, a.IS_LEAF as isLeaf, a.SORT_NO as sortNo, m.MENU_NAME as parentMenuName
from T_SYS_MENU a left join T_SYS_MENU m on a.PARENT_MENU_ID=m.MENU_ID where 1=1 order by a.SORT_NO
